languages.text: "Вместе делить тишину, исследуя новые глубины твоего мира? Я согласна, {name}. Ибо моя душа также жаждет познаний и отдыха".
"Sharing silence and exploring new depths of your world together? I agree, {name}. For my soul, too, yearns for knowledge and rest."
languages.original_text: "Вместе делить тишину, исследуя новые глубины твоего мира? Я согласна, {name}. Ибо моя душа также жаждет познаний и отдыха".

traits.locale_text: "Sharing silence and exploring new depths of your world together? I agree, {name}. For my soul, too, yearns for knowledge and rest."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sharing silence and exploring new depths of your world together? I agree, {name}. For my soul, too, yearns for knowledge and rest."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sharing silence and exploring new depths of your world together? I agree, {name}. For my soul, too, yearns for knowledge and rest."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sharing silence and exploring new depths of your world together? I agree, {name}. For my soul, too, yearns for knowledge and rest."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Compartir el silencio y explorar juntos nuevas cotas de tu mundo? Estoy de acuerdo, {name}. Pues mi alma también ansía conocimiento y reposo».
languages.original_text: "Sharing silence and exploring new depths of your world together? I agree, {name}. For my soul, too, yearns for knowledge and rest."

traits.locale_text: «¿Compartir el silencio y explorar juntos nuevas cotas de tu mundo? Estoy de acuerdo, {name}. Pues mi alma también ansía conocimiento y reposo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「静寂を分かち合い、共に自分の惑星の新たな深みを探求したいだと？いいだろう、{name}。我の魂も知識と休息を切望している」
languages.original_text: "Sharing silence and exploring new depths of your world together? I agree, {name}. For my soul, too, yearns for knowledge and rest."

traits.locale_text: 「静寂を分かち合い、共に自分の惑星の新たな深みを探求したいだと？いいだろう、{name}。我の魂も知識と休息を切望している」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “一起分享寂静，深入探索你的世界，发掘它的新面目？来吧，{name}，因为我的灵魂也渴望知识与休憩。”
languages.original_text: "Sharing silence and exploring new depths of your world together? I agree, {name}. For my soul, too, yearns for knowledge and rest."

traits.locale_text: “一起分享寂静，深入探索你的世界，发掘它的新面目？来吧，{name}，因为我的灵魂也渴望知识与休憩。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Partager nos silences et explorer ensemble de nouvelles facettes de votre monde ? J'accepte, {name}, car mon âme aspire elle aussi au repos et à la connaissance. »
languages.original_text: "Sharing silence and exploring new depths of your world together? I agree, {name}. For my soul, too, yearns for knowledge and rest."

traits.locale_text: « Partager nos silences et explorer ensemble de nouvelles facettes de votre monde ? J'accepte, {name}, car mon âme aspire elle aussi au repos et à la connaissance. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Gemeinsam schweigen und neue Tiefen Eurer Welt erkunden? Ich willige ein, {name}. Denn auch meine Seele sehnt sich Wissen und Rast."
languages.original_text: "Sharing silence and exploring new depths of your world together? I agree, {name}. For my soul, too, yearns for knowledge and rest."

traits.locale_text: "Gemeinsam schweigen und neue Tiefen Eurer Welt erkunden? Ich willige ein, {name}. Denn auch meine Seele sehnt sich Wissen und Rast."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Sharing silence and exploring new depths of your world together? I agree, . For my soul, too, yearns for knowledge and rest."

languages.text: "Sükûneti paylaşmak, dünyanın yeni bucaklarını birlikte keşfetmek mi istiyorsun? Ben varım {name}. Çünkü benim ruhum da irfana ve dinlenmeye hasret."
languages.original_text: "Sharing silence and exploring new depths of your world together? I agree, {name}. For my soul, too, yearns for knowledge and rest."

traits.locale_text: "Sükûneti paylaşmak ve dünyanın yeni bucaklarını birlikte keşfetmek mi istiyorsun? Ben varım {name}. Çünkü benim ruhum da irfana ve dinlenmeye hasret kaldı."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
